task_description: Create tickets for all uncovered tests from coverage.md. Each missing test case gets a ticket that covers writing the test and updating coverage.md. If a test discovers a bug, the failing test is merged first, then a separate bug fix ticket is created.

patterns.ticket_format: Markdown files with: Description, Test Category, Acceptance Criteria, Bug Handling workflow
patterns.coverage_md_format: [ ] uncovered, [x] covered with test file reference

existing_implementations.description: coverage.md contains 347 uncovered tests marked with [ ]. The spec.md has already extracted and categorized all missing tests with priorities.

priority_breakdown.high: ~60 (f32/f64, character literals, type-suffixed literals, boolean params/returns, float comparisons/arithmetic)
priority_breakdown.medium: ~180 (primitive type gaps, operators, control flow, type declarations, features)
